Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable and great location, loved it!!”
Reviews.Author: JoAnnTX
Reviews.Content: spent 5 nights oct 2010 clean freshsmelling faced front bar entrance slept window heard noise staff helped windows top directions using bus la guardia airport friendly location greatlots restaurants grocery close 4 short blocks subway close central park safe walking night definitely stay amsterdam inn return york

Reviews.Content: ive stayed amsterdam inn twice 5 continue legs cant carry steps anymore yes property walkup price value neighborhood nyc clean safe staff exceptional im guessing leave key front desk actually keys key cards expensive time consuming replace lost guests dont understand reviews saying mattress pads mattresses sheets threadbare mattress pads clean soft quality sheets occasions husband stayed biggest reason recommend hotel professionalism courtesy integrity staff husband dropped wallet checked tj front desk attendant called hour leaving housekeeping staff found help received husbands wallet day cant thank tj housekeeping staff person amsterdam inn stand walkup neighborhood clean courteous staff value id highly recommend amsterdam inn stay ny central park couple blocks tons restaurants shopping stays

Reviews.Content: travelling own stayed third floor plain extremely clean daily towels etc replaced required reasonable television cable catching news staff professional happily arranged suitcase carried stairs arrival checkout hotel amazing location couple blocks central park museum natural history easy walk broadway main metro lines run length manhattan prefer stay mainstream hotel purely location

Reviews.Title: “Great for the price”
